targets.query: SELECT moving_average(sum("total_flat_fee"), 2) AS "Hourly Trade Fees" FROM "hb_trades" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)

SELECT mean("cur_value") - mean("cur_quote_bal") AS "_Inventory" FROM "hb_strat_pnl_report" WHERE ("trading_pair" =~ /^$trading_pair$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "trading_pair" fill(null)
SELECT cumulative_sum("total_flat_fee") FROM "hb_trades" WHERE ("trading_pair" =~ /^$trading_pair$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "trading_pair"
SELECT cumulative_sum("total_flat_fee") FROM "hb_trades" WHERE ("trading_pair" =~ /^$trading_pair$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "trading_pair"

SELECT sum("ask_user_reward_usd") *$__interval AS "Total Rewards ASK", sum("bid_user_reward_usd") *$__interval AS "Total Rewards BID" FROM "hb_miner_snapshots" WHERE ("trading_pair" =~ /^$trading_pair$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "trading_pair" fill(previous)
SELECT cumulative_sum("total_flat_fee") FROM "hb_trades" WHERE ("trading_pair" =~ /^$trading_pair$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "trading_pair"

panels.title: Snapshots Mean Age Latency Change per minute, last 30 minutes

targets.query: SELECT mean("cur_value") - mean("cur_quote_bal") AS "Inventory" FROM "hb_strat_pnl_report" WHERE ("trading_pair" =~ /^$trading_pair$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "trading_pair" fill(null)

SELECT mean("cur_value") - mean("cur_quote_bal") AS "_Inventory" FROM "hb_strat_pnl_report" WHERE ("trading_pair" =~ /^$trading_pair$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "trading_pair" fill(null)

SELECT sum("summary_stats_oov_eligible_ask") AS "Eligible Ask", sum("summary_stats_oov_ask") AS "Total Ask", sum("summary_stats_oov_eligible_bid") AS "Eligible Bid", sum("summary_stats_oov_bid") AS "Total Bid", sum("summary_stats_usd_payout") AS "Rewards" FROM "hb_miner_earnings" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "trading_pair"
SELECT "total_flat_fee" AS "Trade Fees", "total_flat_fee" AS "Trades" FROM "hb_trades" GROUP BY "trading_pair"
SELECT cumulative_sum("total_flat_fee") FROM "hb_trades" WHERE ("trading_pair" =~ /^$trading_pair$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "trading_pair"

SELECT sum("ask_user_reward_usd") *$__interval AS "Total Rewards ASK", sum("bid_user_reward_usd") *$__interval AS "Total Rewards BID" FROM "hb_miner_snapshots" WHERE ("trading_pair" =~ /^$trading_pair$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "trading_pair" fill(previous)
SELECT cumulative_sum("total_flat_fee") FROM "hb_trades" WHERE ("trading_pair" =~ /^$trading_pair$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "trading_pair"

SELECT sum("ask_user_reward_usd") *$__interval AS "Total Rewards ASK", sum("bid_user_reward_usd") *$__interval AS "Total Rewards BID" FROM "hb_miner_snapshots" WHERE ("trading_pair" =~ /^$trading_pair$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "trading_pair" fill(previous)

panels.title: USD Bid and Ask Pressure (ITM median)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "trading_pair" WHERE "exchange" =~ /^$exchange_name$/
list.label: Trading Pair
list.name: trading_pair
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "trading_pair" WHERE "exchange" =~ /^$exchange_name$/
